long_description: The extremely lightweight Inov8 Road-X-Treme 158 road-running shoes offer a minimalist fit and feel so you can perfect your natural running technique while logging your miles. Breathable polyester mesh uppers feature thermoplastic urethane overlays for support. Polyester linings offer moisture management to keep feet dry and comfortable. Injection-molded EVA midsoles offer lightweight support and cushioning; 3mm heel-to-drop gives a low-to-ground foot position. Dynamic polymer bands run the length of feet, giving support and a kick of energy with every step. Sticky rubber outsoles on the Inov8 Road-X-Treme 158 running shoes offer sure footing on wet and dry surfaces. All-synthetic construction makes these vegan-friendly.
short_description: The extremely lightweight Inov8 Road-X-Treme 158 road-running shoes offer a minimalist fit and feel so you can perfect your natural running technique while logging your miles.
